summary: This adds a simple spell, it disarms your opponents, sends them flying and does a bit of damage, it has a 2 1/2 second charge up so beware.
descriptionHtml:
This adds a simple spell, it disarms your opponents, sends them flying and does a bit of damage, it has a 2 1/2 second charge up so beware. 

The spell tomes are in common places such as the river wood trader. careful they require theft once I figure out how to add it to the shop keepers selling inventory I will.
author: Assassain33
